title: Why can't I play Vayne?
body:
I like to think I'm pretty decent mechanically. I'm no doublelift don't get me wrong, but I'm pretty good mechanically. Most of the time that is. 

However, whenever I pick Vayne, all my mechanics go completely out the window. I end up fighting in melee range since I'll fail at clicking on people and instead click the ground next to them 30 times. For some reason whenever I pick Vayne it's like I'm playing a brand new game.

I can play Ezreal and Twitch with no issues, so it's not like it's an adc thing. Just Vayne.
